data: ANES Multi-Modal Pain Management
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Restricted to Department of Anesthesiology
Patient Care
Communication Order

Do NOT give any Opioids, CNS Depressants, and other analgesics unless approved by the Acute Pain Service (APS) / Perioperative Pain Service (POPS) / Anesthesiology (EXCEPT in Critical Care Units: CSICU and ICU)
Notify Treating Provider
Notify attending provider if no bowel protocol ordered for patients while on PCA, epidural or other opioid therapy
Order for Duplicate Checking, do not modify
May use Home CPAP/BiPAP
Patient may use Home Settings, if pre-operatively patient was on established positive airway pressure therapy
Medications
Nothing per Rectum
No suppositories (rectal medication)
Pre-operative medications for chronic pain should be re-ordered and / or equivalent opioid conversion ordered
ANES Weaning / Opioid Breakthrough (Module)
None
Do not order IV HYDROmorphone or morphine if patient is on PCA
IV Opioids
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 0.5 to 2 mg, IV, q30min, PRN pain-breakthrough, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.1 to 0.4 mg, IV, q30min, PRN pain-breakthrough, drug form: inj
Reduced dose of IV opioid suggested if patient has received intrathecal opioid
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, IV, q1h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.1 to 0.2 mg, IV, q1h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
PO Opioids
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 2.5 to 5 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 2 to 4 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
oxyCODONE PRN range dose
dose range: 2.5 to 5 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
Subcutaneous Opioids
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 2.5 to 5 mg, subcutaneous, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, subcutaneous, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, subcutaneous, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, subcutaneous, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
acetaminophen
650 mg, PO, QID q4h, order duration: 72 hour, drug form: tab
975 mg, PO, QID, order duration: 72 hour, drug form: tab
acetaminophen
975 mg, PO, QID, Order duration: 7 days, drug form: tab
650 mg, PO, QID, Order duration: 7 days, drug form: tab
acetaminophen
975 mg, PO, QID q6h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
650 mg, PO, QID q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
acetaminophen
650 mg, rectal, QID, order duration: 72 hour, drug form: supp
acetaminophen
650 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
975 mg, PO, QID, PRN pain, drug form: tab
NSAIDs contraindicated in renal dysfunction. Verify if NSAIDs ordered by surgical service
naproxen
500 mg, PO, BID with food, order duration: 72 hour, drug form: tab
naproxen
500 mg, PO, BID, PRN pain, drug form: tab
ibuprofen
400 mg, PO, QID BID with food, order duration: 72 hour, drug form: tab
ibuprofen
400 mg, PO, QID BID, PRN pain, drug form: tab
diclofenac EC
50 mg, PO, BID with food, order duration: 72 hour, drug form: tab-EC
diclofenac EC
50 mg, PO, BID, PRN pain, drug form: tab-EC
diclofenac
50 mg, rectal, BID, order duration: 72 hour, drug form: supp
diclofenac
50 mg, rectal, BID, PRN pain, drug form: supp
ketorolac
15 mg, IV, q8h, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: inj
celecoxib
100 mg, PO, BID with food, order duration: 72 hour, drug form: cap
celecoxib
100 mg, PO, BID, PRN pain, drug form: cap
If required, select one HS medication only
zopiclone
3.75 mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab
oxazepam
15 mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab
LORazepam
1 mg, sublingual, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab-sublingual
0.5 mg, sublingual, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab-sublingual
melatonin
3mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab-sublingual
6 mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab-sublingual
trazadone
12.5 mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab
25 mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab
ondansetron
4 mg, IV, q8h, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: inj
ondansetron
4 mg, IV, q8h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
ondansetron
4 mg, IV, q8h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
dimenhyDRINATE PRN range dose
dose range: 12.5 to 25 mg, IV, q4h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
dose range: 25 to 50 mg, IV, q4h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
metoclopramide PRN range dose
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, IV, q6h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
dose range: 10 to 20 mg, IV, q6h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
diphenhydrAMINE
25 mg, PO, q6h, PRN itching, drug form: cap
diphenhydrAMINE
12.5 mg, IV, q6h, PRN itching, drug form: inj
25 mg, IV, q6h, PRN itching, drug form: inj
ANES Respiratory Depression (Module)
Respiratory
Oxygen Therapy
0 to 4 L/min by nasal prongs, titrate to a minimum flow that maintains baseline SpO2 at: 93% and above
0 to 4 L/min by nasal prongs, titrate to a minimum flow that maintains baseline SpO2 at: 90% and above
Consults/Referrals
Anesthesia Pain Service Following
T;N
